sense.def:
Organizacija ali dejavnost, ki je
profitable
, ustvarja ali prinaša dobiček.

seg.quote: The farm is a highly profitable business.
It was more profitable to export the crops.
Can the motor vehicle industry operate profitably?
...a decline in the profitability of public transport.

sense.def:
Kar je
profitable
, nam prinese neko korist.

seg.quote: He certainly made profitable use of the lessons he had learnt.
There was little I could profitably do sitting at my desk.
